meanings.definition: Resembling or characteristic of a screw.
meanings.sent1: The screwlike shell of the snail helped protect it from predators.
meanings.sent2: The screwlike handle on the jar made it easy to open.
meanings.sent3: The screwlike design of the staircase railing added a fun twist to the house decor.
meanings.sent4: Her hair was styled in a screwlike bun, holding it securely in place.
meanings.sent5: The screwlike pattern on the fabric created an interesting texture.

meanings.definition: Having the shape or appearance of a screw.
meanings.sent1: The screwlike tail of the seahorse helped it grip onto the coral.
meanings.sent2: The screwlike threads on the bottle cap ensured a tight seal.
meanings.sent3: The screwlike clouds in the sky seemed to be unraveling in the wind.
meanings.sent4: His voice had a screwlike quality, twisting and turning with each word.
meanings.sent5: The screwlike path through the forest led them to a hidden clearing.
